name: HCI_v1_policy_2025Q4
description: Policy layer for HCI_v1: distinguishes calibration anchors vs WIP and applies WIP ceiling.
notes: Scores are computed from axes + calibration first, then policy is applied.
Songs listed in data/calibration_index_2025Q4.json are treated as anchors (can reach 1.0).
All other songs are treated as WIP and are softly capped below 1.0.
